metadata.title: CVE-2023-52687 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:safexcel - Add error handling for dma_map_sg() calls Macro dma_map_sg() mayreturn 0 on error. This patch enables checks in case of the macro failureand ensures unmapping of previously mapped buffers with dma_unmap_sg().Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with static analysistool SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
